name: 芮祥鵬
objective: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括: (1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論 (5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
schedule:
Chapter 1 Polymer Histry and Introduction         (1 wk)
Chapter 2 Polymer solution and conformation        (1 wk)
Chapter 3 Polymer solid physics                   (2 wk)
Chapter 4  Fluid Mechanics (2 wks)
Chapter 5-Viscosity (2 wks)
Mid-term Exam
Chapter 6 Viscoelasticity (1 wk)
Chapter 13 Rubber elasticity (1 wk)
Chapter7 Composite Materials (1 wk)
Chapter 9 Fracture Mechanics (1 wk)
Chapter 10 Special topic on polymer blend & compounding (2 wk)
Final Reports
materials:
Polymers: Chemistry and Physics of Modern Materials  (3rd edition)
(J.M.G. Cowie; Valeria Arrighi)
